name: Lockdown Diaries
description:
Lockdown Diaries is a puzzle game where the player decrypts corrupted messages from their friends. The player decrypts messages by flipping over the letter tiles. One side of the tile is correct, the other is incorrect. The decrypted messages contain unique, relatable and weird thoughts and experiences during the pandemic. The messages are written by our friends.

A Game by Reino Hämäläinen, Arhi Makkonen and Topi Paavilainen.
